```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Problem 1

Loading the penguins dataset and getting a `glimpse` of it.
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
glimpse(penguins)
```

This dataset contains information about the penguin characteristics listed below.

| Variable | Unit | Data Type |
|-----|-----|-----|
| Species | NA |  Factor |
| Island | NA |  Factor |
| Bill Length | mm |  Double |
| Bill Depth | mm |  Double |
| Flipper Length | mm |  Integer |
| Body Mass | g |  Integer |
| Sex | NA |  Factor |
| Year | NA |  Integer |


The `penguins` dataset contains `r nrow(penguins)` rows and `ncol(penguins)` columns.
